subject: RE: A shipment from order #SSN5728 is on the way
description_text:
Hi

                                I've received my QRs but it looks like one of them wasn't machined correctly.

                                As you can see from the pictures, one of them doesn't have threads in all of the holes so doesn't fit on one of my wheels.

                                Would you be able to arrange a replacement and if you require me to return the faulty one can you please send a pre-paid label.

Thanks

Mark

From: SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>

conversations.body_text:
Hi Mark Rivers,  ​We apologize for this issue. We have verified it and arranged a reissue for you. Here is your reissue link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047246176622         
                           
                            On
                            Wed, 14 Jan at  6:42 PM
                            ,  Mark Rivers <thedozyone@hotmail.com>  wrote:
                             
 Hi 
   
                                 I’ve received my QRs but it looks like one of them wasn’t machined correctly. 
   
                                 As you can see from the pictures, one of them doesn’t have threads in all of the holes so doesn’t fit on one of my
 wheels. 
   
                                 Would you be able to arrange a replacement and if you require me to return the faulty one can you please send a pre-paid
 label. 
   
 Thanks 
   
 Mark
